response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our flagship product, which holds immense value and potential for growth. This exceptional item is worth $800,000 to you, and we are excited to offer it to you at a special introductory price of $750,000. This exclusive offer is designed to reward early adopters and provide you with unparalleled benefits. Don't miss out on this chance to secure a valuable asset at a highly favorable rate. Kindly let us know if you wish to proceed with this offer.", "product_price": 750000}
